application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T2. Holm Oak, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 2 metres. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 5 meters tall and 2.5 meters wide.T3. Bay, Fell - As requested suggested works are too: Fell to ground level by sectional take down and grind out Stump 200mm below ground levelT4. Camellia, Fell - As requested suggested works are too: Fell to ground level by sectional take down and grind out Stump 200mm below ground levelT5. Pear, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1.5 metres. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 4 meters tall and 2.5 meters wide.
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T2
